repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of financial records, committee notes, and correspondence documenting the activities of the Yale controller (formerly comptroller).

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of Finance and Administration

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 5-B (YRG 5-B), Accounting records and records of the Yale comptroller.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See inventory for details

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Controller, Yale University, Records (RU 724). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of financial records, committee notes, and correspondence documenting the activities of the Yale controller (formerly comptroller)

scopecontent.p: No online inventory available. Paper inventory available in repository

Records of the Office of Gift Administration
did.materialspec: Use of the UFMIS-Oracle conversion source numbers in box 35 is required to use the microfiche in this accession.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to Office of Origin only

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Microfiche records of the Office of Gift Administration includes: Consolidated Financial Statements; Detailed Transactions by Dept/Fund Sequence; Fund Summary Statements; General Ledger; Year-to-Date Income and Expense; Remaining Balance of Restricted Funds; Remaining Fund Balance; General Appropriations Operating Statements by University, School and Department, 1977-1999 (bulk 1985-1999). Also includes code key binder.

did.unittitle: Records of the Office of Gift Administration

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to Office of Origin only

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Accession 2014-A-013 consists of treasury indentures (now called abstracts) from the Office of Gift Administration which documents a donor's intent/restrictions/preferences on how his/her restricted gift is to be used by the University. Endowment funds are kept in perpetuity.
